title: Pixel 2 loses network while on wifi
content:
I've been having this problem for several months now. What happens is that the phone remains connected to wifi with a strong signal (I'm sitting beside it) but network speeds drop to zero.

The problem doesn't affect my wife's Pixel 3 or our two Macs so we can rule out router failure.

Disconnecting from/reconnecting to wifi resolves the problem but only for a few minutes.

I've tried the following fixes to no avail:

1. Forget / readd wifi network
2. Reboot phone / router
3. Reset network settings
4. Set Google DNS servers
5. Disabled Google Location Accuracy
6. Factory reset phone

Help.
